name: The Gang Goes Through the McDonald's Drive Thru
name_original: The Gang Goes Through the McDonald's Drive Thru
description:
After a fun day at the beach, Nerus, Asterion, Killigan and Ollie decide to stop by a local McDonald's restaurant. Nothing weird happens, I promise.

This is a SFW one-shot VN made in collaboration with several notable VN creators for April Fool's Day 2022.

Please note that the android version does not support the every feature, so if you have the option, please consider playing one of the other versions of the game.

Please consider checking out the games that the characters that appear in the VN belong to!
